document.full_text: the united nations authorized military action to curb libyan leader muammar gaddafi on thursday, hours after he threatened to storm the rebel bastion of benghazi overnight, showing "no mercy, no pity."
document.title: u.n. okays military action on libya
lines_and_colors: the united nations authorized military action to curb libyan leader muammar gaddafi on thursday, hours after he threatened to storm the rebel bastion of benghazi overnight, showing "no mercy, no pity."
